item.title: The Joy of Logging With Python
item.description:
**In painting and coding, there are no mistakes, only happy accidents. **

Fortunately when errors happen, Python affords us its stock 'logging' module, which sometimes catches flak in the community for its syntax and documentation. After poking around this module, I've found it quite suitable to my needs. Thanks to the …
